title: 关于一个殖民地整合包老是崩溃的问题
author: DXZ167
txt_content:
本帖最后由 Tollainmear 于 2020-4-24 09:07 编辑 

在下不才，从论坛上找到一个殖民地mod的相关整合包，但总是在创造世界后崩溃，原因为未知MOD，现在连打开游戏都有了问题，启动器用的是PCL，下面试运行日志，希望各位大佬能帮忙检查问题---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Why did you do that?

Time: 2020-04-23 15:35:42 CST
Description: Initializing game

net.minecraft.client.renderer.StitcherException: Unable to fit: conarm:items/boots/broken_core_pigiron, size: 16x16, atlas: 2048x2048, atlasMax: 2048x2048 - Maybe try a lower resolution resourcepack?

    at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)
